name: About Us
description:
About us    


 

Welcome to Emedilife Limited, We are Bangladeshi based leading digital healthcare platform. We're dedicated to providing you the best of telemedicine service, with in short time.

 

We are a consumer healthcare “Emedilife app” that provides consumers with on-demand, home delivered access to a wide range of prescription, OTC pharmaceutical, other consumer healthcare products, comprehensive diagnostic test services, and tele consultations thereby serving their healthcare need.


Emedilife is a Bangladeshi’s leading digital healthcare platform. Bangladesh is overwhelmingly going to a digital Bangladesh in recent years. Peoples are engaging more and more on digital devices and also services for its own and dear ones. In this regard, we are getting closer everyone and done many things with a single click. We know that, health is the best wealth. When we fall/face in sick, we then see how health important for human’s life. From going to hospitals, institutes or clinics; admitting and taking services from them is relentlessly need trained and knowledgeable personnel.  Firstly our vision is to deliver your ordered medicines without any delivery cost. Secondly, we’ll collect all doctors’ and lab tests’ information in our country . From e-appointment of  Bangladeshi doctors’ at their chamber from all over the world, consultations on call and chat, online pharmacy and lab tests; what are seeming to you-we have it all covered for you. We are on a mission to bring best healthcare services in Bangladesh which give you a flawless healthcare experience. So, Happy Living.

name: About Us
description:
Crizotinib is an inhibitor of receptor tyrosine kinases including ALK, Hepatocyte Growth Factor Receptor (HGFR, c-Met), ROS1 (c-ros), and Recepteur d'Origine Nantais (RON). Translocations can affect the ALK gene resulting in the expression of oncogenic fusion proteins. The formation of ALK fusion proteins results in activation and dysregulation of the gene’s expression and signaling which can contribute to increased cell proliferation and survival in tumors expressing these proteins. Crizotinib demonstrated concentration-dependent inhibition of ALK, ROS1, and c-Met phosphorylation in cell-based assays using tumor cell lines and demonstrated antitumor activity in mice bearing tumor xenografts that expressed echinoderm microtubule-associated protein-like 4 (EML4)- or nucleophosmin (NPM)-ALK fusion proteins or c-Met.


Crizotinib is an inhibitor of receptor tyrosine kinases including ALK, Hepatocyte Growth Factor Receptor (HGFR, c-Met), ROS1 (c-ros), and Recepteur d'Origine Nantais (RON). Translocations can affect the ALK gene resulting in the expression of oncogenic fusion proteins. The formation of ALK fusion proteins results in activation and dysregulation of the gene’s expression and signaling which can contribute to increased cell proliferation and survival in tumors expressing these proteins. Crizotinib demonstrated concentration-dependent inhibition of ALK, ROS1, and c-Met phosphorylation in cell-based assays using tumor cell lines and demonstrated antitumor activity in mice bearing tumor xenografts that expressed echinoderm microtubule-associated protein-like 4 (EML4)- or nucleophosmin (NPM)-ALK fusion proteins or c-Met.

name: About Us
description:
Crizotinib is an inhibitor of receptor tyrosine kinases including ALK, Hepatocyte Growth Factor Receptor (HGFR, c-Met), ROS1 (c-ros), and Recepteur d'Origine Nantais (RON). Translocations can affect the ALK gene resulting in the expression of oncogenic fusion proteins. The formation of ALK fusion proteins results in activation and dysregulation of the gene’s expression and signaling which can contribute to increased cell proliferation and survival in tumors expressing these proteins. Crizotinib demonstrated concentration-dependent inhibition of ALK, ROS1, and c-Met phosphorylation in cell-based assays using tumor cell lines and demonstrated antitumor activity in mice bearing tumor xenografts that expressed echinoderm microtubule-associated protein-like 4 (EML4)- or nucleophosmin (NPM)-ALK fusion proteins or c-Met.


Crizotinib is a kinase inhibitor indicated for the treatment of patients with locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) that is anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK)-positive or ROS 1 positive. Crizotinib is the first FDA-approved biomarker-driven therapy for both ALK positive and ROS1-positive metastatic NSCLC. It is the only FDA approved drug for ROS 1 positive NSCLC.

name: Privacy Policy
description:
Privacy Policy


Welcome to the Emedilife limited website (the "Site") operated by Emedilife Limited. We respect your privacy and want to protect your personal information. To learn more, please read this Privacy Policy. As a owner of the Platform, we may collect from a user (“You”, “Your” or “User”), on or through Our website (www.emedilife.com) (the “Site”) or one or more mobile application (the “App”), directly (the owner and the operator of the Platform are referred collectively as “We”/ “Us”/ ”Our”) or in relation to services otherwise rendered by Us (collectively “Platform”), including Our facilitation through the Platform, of purchase of pharmaceutical drugs from Retail Pharmacies, consultation with registered medical practitioners or facilitation of consultation with registered medical practitioners by third-parties (“Medical Practitioners”) and the facilitation of services by third parties which may include delivery of pharmaceutical, nutraceutical, over the counter products and such other products as ordered by You through the App or the Site, and scheduling diagnostic tests (each a “Service”, and collectively the “Services”) and how We use, process, disclose and try to protect such information. This Privacy Policy is published in compliance with, inter alia:  The Digital Security Act  The Telecom Act  The Contract Act, 1872  The Consumers' Rights Protection Act, 2009


This Privacy Policy is published in compliance with, inter alia: 

1. The Digital Security Act 
2. The Telecom Act 
3. The Contract Act, 1872 
4. The Consumers' Rights Protection Act, 2009


This Privacy Policy clarifies how we gather, use and (under specific conditions) unveil your own data. This Privacy Policy likewise clarifies the means we have taken to get your own data. At last, this Privacy Policy clarifies your choices with respect to the assortment, use and exposure of your own data. By visiting the Site straightforwardly or through another site, you acknowledge the practices portrayed in this Policy.


Information assurance involves trust and your security is imperative to us. We will subsequently just utilize your name and other data which identifies with you in the way set out in this Privacy Policy. We will just gather data where it is fundamental for us to do as such and we will just gather data in case it is applicable to our dealings with you.


You can visit the Site and peruse without giving individual subtleties. During your visit to the Site you stay mysterious and at no time would we be able to distinguish you except if you have a record on the Site and sign on with your client name and secret word.


Our Privacy Policy explains: 

1. What information we collect 

2. How we use Information 

3. How we share Information 

4. How to manage your Information 

5. How we protect Information 

6. When this Privacy Policy applies


1. What Information We Collect


When you register for Online Services, we may collect the following information from you:


 First and last name 

 E-mail address 

 Date of birth 

 Phone number 

 Full address 

 National ID scan where applicable 

 Professional documents scans where applicable  User photograph where applicable 

 Locations data of users  App usage data 

 Device and System data such as type of phone, operating system 

 Medical, health and diagnostic data where applicable 

 Family medical history where applicable 

 Health, sign and symptoms, disease and disease related data where applicable.


Other data portrayed in this Privacy Policy


At the point when you utilize Online Services, you might give specific data straightforwardly to us, when you permit us to get data about you from different sources. We may likewise get consequently gathered data through the Online Services. We might utilize normal advancements like treats, tokens, labels, guides, scripts and Web server logs, also as usefulness that can gather information from a cell phone. The naturally gathered data might incorporate segment, de-distinguished, accumulated, or certain data gathered consequently through your gadget like specialized data about your gadget, internet browser data, and server log documents gathered by us or given by you. Our versatile applications may likewise gather data explicit to utilization of your cell phone, like a remarkable gadget identifier and exact relocation data. Certain elements of the Online Services may effectively record data about you as you utilize the Online Services. This following is refined through incorporation with Google's areas based calculation and other related programming items. We utilize this data exclusively to furnish you with areas and catchphrase search-related criticism and related administrations. You might restrict the Information you give or make accessible to us assuming you need to; notwithstanding, that might restrict your capacity to access or utilize specific elements of the Online Services or to demand specific administrations or data.


2.How We Use Information 


We may use the Information for a number of purposes such as:

 To respond to an e-mail or particular request from you.

 To communicate with you. 

 To provide you with content through our Online Services or other services that we may offer. 

 To process an application for a product or service as requested by you. 

 To authenticate you on any portion of our Online Services and with vendors acting on our behalf. 

 To administer surveys and promotions. 

 To personalize your experience on our Online Services. 

 To provide you with informational or promotional offers, as permitted by law, that we believe may be useful to you, such as information about products or services provided by us or other businesses. 

 To perform analytics and to improve our products, Online Services, and advertising. 

 To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal process. 

 To protect someone’s health, safety, or welfare. 

 To protect our rights, the rights of affiliates or related third parties, or take appropriate legal action, such as to enforce our Terms of Use. 

 To keep a record of our transactions and communications.  


As otherwise necessary or useful for us to conduct our business, so long as such use is permitted by law or for any other purposes with your consent.


We may use Information to contact you through any contact information you provide through our Online Services or any other services we offer, any e-mail address, telephone number, or cell phone number.


We may, when permitted, combine your Information with other information, whether online or offline, maintained or available to us from you or from other sources, such as from our vendors, and we may use and disclose combined data for the purpose described in this Section or for internal business purposes. We may, when permitted, use and disclose de-identified and aggregated data for any purpose, which may without limitation, disclosures to third parties for analytics purposes such as evaluating the Online Services and providing additional benefits, programs, and services.


3. How We Share Information


We will only share your Information with third parties as outlined in this Policy and as otherwise permitted by law or as permitted with your consent. 


We may share Information if all or part of the Company is sold, merged, dissolved, acquired, or disbanded to any extent in a similar transaction, or in connection with steps that may need to be taken in anticipation of such events.


We may share Information in response to a court order, subpoena, search warrant, or to comply with law or regulation. We may cooperate with law enforcement authorities in investigating and prosecuting activities that are illegal, violate our rules, or may be harmful to other visitors.


We may also share Information within the Company, discussions among affiliates, or with our parent company, or subsidiaries.


We may also share Information with other third-party companies that we have a business relationship with or hire to perform services on our behalf. For example, we may hire a company to help us send and manage e-mail, and we might provide that company with your e-mail address and certain other information in order for them to send you an e-mail message on our behalf. Similarly, we may hire companies to host or operate some of our Online Services and related computers and software applications.


Posting Messages, Comments, and Content


Our Online Services may have collaboration areas, not limited to “blogs,” “bulletin boards,” “leader boards,” and “health games,” that permit users to have collaborative discussions and/or share information. Some of our Online Services may permit you to select a display name or image that will be “nickname” on the Online Service. Please note, any information you submit or post to these collaboration areas, such as your display name or image, may be visible by other users of the Online Service, and such users may share with others. Therefore, please be thoughtful in what you write and understand that this information may become public.


4.How to Manage Your Information


Emedilife Limited may permit you to see your profile, if suitable, and access related Information about you and to request changes to, or eradication of such Information. If this limit is open, you may move toward a page on the Online Services through which you may review your profile, if material, and related Information about you, and you may have decisions to change or eradicate or such Information. Benevolently recall, in any case, if we have adequately revealed a piece of this Information to pariahs, we probably won't move toward that uncovered information and will not be able to compel the retraction or adjustment of any information by outcasts to whom we have made those disclosures.


5.How We Protect Information


 We keep up with electronic, physical and procedural shields regarding the assortment, stockpiling and divulgence of individual data (counting SPDI). Our security methods might warrant that We may incidentally demand confirmation of character before We uncover individual data to You. 


  We work to ensure the security of Your data during transmission by utilizing Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) programming, which encodes data You input as well as keeping up with security of Your data according to the worldwide principles on "Data Technology Security Techniques Information Security Management System-Requirements". 


  We confine admittance to individual data, to Our workers and specialists who need to realize that data to handle it for Us, and who are dependent upon severe authoritative privacy commitments, and might be focused or whose relationship with Us might end if they neglect to meet these commitments. 


  No representative or manager will know about Your secret phrase of Your record on the Site or the App. You should ensure Your record against unapproved admittance to Your secret word and Your cell phone, as itemized in the 'Client Account, Password and Security' part of the Terms. You should make certain to log off from the Site or the App when You have completed use thereof. We don't attempt any obligation for any unapproved utilization of Your record and secret key. 


  If You presume any unapproved utilization of Your record, You should quickly inform Us by sending an email to the contact subtleties showed in the contact segment. You will be obligated to reimburse Us because of any misfortune endured by Us because of such unapproved utilization of Your record or secret phrase. 


  In specific situations, We will not have the option to take Your earlier assent prior to uncovering Your data on the off chance that the data is requested by government offices or in any case ordered under law to acquire SPDI, or during examination of digital episodes, indictment of offenses and so on 


  Further, We will not be answerable for any break of safety or for any activities of any outsiders or occasions that are past Our sensible control including yet not restricted to demonstrations of government, PC hacking, unapproved admittance to PC information and capacity gadget, PC crashes, break of safety and encryption, low quality of network access or telephone utility of the User, and so 


6.When this Privacy Policy Applies


The Platform gives You admittance to a wide scope of data about Your record and Your connections with the Platform for the restricted motivation behind survey and, in specific cases, changing, erasing data gave on the App or the Site. You have the choice to quit discretionary administrations, for example, getting special materials and so forth and should You want to pick in to such administrations at the hour of joining You can pick do as such.


WE WILL NEVER SHARING YOUR INFORMATION WITH THIRD PARTIES


Emedilife Limited never share your own data with any outsider except if totally needed to do as such by law, or except if needed for those specialist co-ops we use to work and improve emedilife restricted.


Specialist co-ops handle administrations, for example, installment handling, spam identification, network information transmission, and other comparative administrations. We stay liable for your data when imparted to our specialist organizations, and it may be utilized and put away for the reasons itemized in this report.


Whenever possible, each section of this Privacy Policy shall be interpreted in a manner so as to be valid under applicable law. However, in the event of any provision is held to be prohibited or invalid, such provision shall be ineffective only to the extent of such prohibition or invalidity, without invalidating the remainder of such provision or other remaining provisions of this Privacy Policy.

name: Cancellation, Returns and Refund policy
description:
Cancellation, Returns and Refund policy


Cancellation Policy 


1. How can I cancel an order? 


1.1 Medicines and Healthcare Products An order for medicines or healthcare products can be cancelled from the ‘Order Details’ screen on the Emedilife.com.bd website/ app (‘Platform’) before it is marked as “SHIPPING”. Else, you can refuse it at the time of delivery and a refund will be processed as per the Refund Policy.


Return Policy 


1. What is the time period for return of orders 


1.1 Medicine Orders We have product specific return policy. The return window ranges from 0-30 days from the date of delivery. The information regarding the return policy can be found on the product page. Please check the return policy before placing any order. 


1.2 Healthcare Products All the healthcare products ordered from the Platform can be returned within 2 days from the date of delivery.


2. Which Products are not eligible for Returns? 


2.1 Products Not Eligible for Return- As per terms offered by all the sellers on the Platform, the products shall not be eligible for a return under the following circumstances


1. If the item has been opened, partially used or disfigured. The user is strongly advised to check the package carefully at the time of acceptance of products by the user from the user’s delivery agent; 

2. If the product has been tampered with; 

3. If the product packaging and/or packaging box and/or packaging seal has been tampered with. The user is strongly advised to check the package carefully at the time of acceptance of products by the user from the user’s delivery agent and it is emphasized that the user should not accept the order if the package appears to be tampered; 

4. If it is mentioned on the product detail page that the product is non-returnable; 

5. Any accessories/freebies supplied with the product are missing; 

6. If the product does not have serial number / UPC number/ barcode affixed, which was present at the time of acceptance of products by the user from the user’s delivery agent; 

7. Any damage/defect which is not covered under the manufacturer's warranty; 

8. The product is without original packing and accessories/freebies; 

9. If the product is damaged due to misuse; 

10.Products related to personal care, baby care, food & nutrition, healthcare devices, covid essential products including but not limited to masks and gloves, sexual wellness products including but not limited to condoms, pregnancy/fertility kits, any other products such as but not limited to diapers, health drinks, health supplements, glucometers, glucometer strips/lancets, health monitors, etc. Additionally, we do not take return of certain items such as sexual wellness products, diapers, etc. However, the Company shall accept return if aforementioned products are defective, deficient or spurious or not of the characteristics or features as advertised or if they are delivered late.


3. Additional Note – 


3.1 Items marked as "Non-Returnable" on the product detail page or items whose return window has expired cannot be returned. If such an item is indeed returned along with another returnable item, Emedilife.com.bd will disallow a refund or return of the “Non-Returnable” product to you when our partner licensed retail pharmacy verifies the returned item(s). 


4. How to Return? 


4.1  You can raise a return request within the time frame mentioned above by following these simple steps on the Platform: 


1. Go to My Orders; 

2. Select the respective order and click on ‘RETURN’; 

3. Check to see if the product/s that you wish to return are returnable and have an active return window; 

4. Select the item you wish to return with quantity and reason for return. 

4.2 You can also place a request for return of any product by calling the customer support.

4.3 After your return request is processed, we will pick up the return items as per the following timelines: 


1. For Local Cities*: Within 24-48 hours from the time of approval of return request. 

2. For Other Cities: Between 4-5 business days from the time of approval of return request. Please note that this time period may be longer depending on the third-party courier partners terms. 3.Please keep the return package ready in its original packaging with all the labels intact. You are also requested to keep a copy of the invoice/ bill from the seller handy for verification.


Refund Policy 


1. When would I be able to anticipate that the amount should be discounted? 

1.1 Please note that the discount sum referenced at the hour of return on the Platform is a gauge and will be settled after finishing of confirmation. When the get is finished and the item is checked by the merchant, a discount of the aggregate sum paid for the items returned by you will be started for qualified returns as referenced previously.

1.2 Refund will be started just post effective confirmation of the items by the merchant. If it's not too much trouble, note that the check cycle might take: 

1.3. For Local Cities*: 48 hours from the hour of get from your area. 

1.4 For Other Cities: 8-10 work days from the date of get from your area. 

1.5 The sum is relied upon to reflect in your record after fulfillment of check from the vender according to the accompanying courses of events: 

1.6.You comprehend and recognize that we hold the freedoms to guarantee back any discount that has been handled by us because of false exercises like return of wrong items or wrong amount of the items.


Assured Delivery Cashback Eligibility: 


 1. Compassionately note the accompanying standards for qualification for guaranteed conveyance Cashback: 

1.1 Delivery affirmation is for the date of conveyance and not for the hour of conveyance. 

1.2 Cashback is relevant just for orders. 

1.3 Applicable in select pin-codes just, the client will be educated regarding his qualification at the hour of submitting the request on the checkout page. 

1.4 If qualified, cashback will be handled inside 48 hours of request conveyance/fruition. 

1.5 Orders, where postponement is from client's end, won't be considered for the cashback.

10.Products related to personal care, baby care, food & nutrition, healthcare devices, covid essential products including but not limited to masks and gloves, sexual wellness products including but not limited to condoms, pregnancy/fertility kits, any other products such as but not limited to diapers, health drinks, health supplements, glucometers, glucometer strips/lancets, health monitors, etc. Additionally, we do not take return of certain items such as sexual wellness products, diapers, etc. However, the Company shall accept return if aforementioned products are defective, deficient or spurious or not of the characteristics or features as advertised or if they are delivered late.

If such an item is indeed returned along with another returnable item, Emedilife.com.bd will disallow a refund or return of the “Non-Returnable” product to you when our partner licensed retail pharmacy verifies the returned item(s).
